author: prbuzz.com
title: Bookescaperooms Launched their new website portal called bookescaperooms.com
text:
Bookescaperooms launched their new website portal called bookescaperooms.com. The new website portal is planned to launch in mid September 2015. It is being created to take the puzzle away from finding the ideal escape room individuals in any city around the world. The new and easy to use website will allow players to book their room based on the number of players.
The new website portal has difficulty level and language spoken in any participating escape room around the world. The players who are using the new website will have a great chance to get the cheapest possible price for the escape room, better than from any other ticket seller. According to one of the founders of Bookescaperooms Sergio Zammit, “With the continual growth of the phenomenon which are puzzle escape rooms, we created an easy to use, fast and efficient service to help users find the next puzzle escape room in just one simple click.”
With the help and existence of Bookescaperooms, people will not find hard time and difficulty to find the ideal escape room they are looking for. One of the top benefits that people will get in using this new website portal is that they will get the cheapest price for the escape room they choose. Bookescaperooms worked hand in hand to assure their users that they will never be disappointed in using their new website portal. The new website portal will be surely loved by its users.
Customer satisfaction is their top priority and this is one of the reasons why they strive hard and worked together to meet the needs, expectations and demands of all their respected users. It is a fact that finding the best ideal escape room is not an easy thing to do but with the help and existence of bookescaperooms.com, it is possible.
The new website portal is creatively designed and developed to take the puzzle away from searching the best escape room in any parts of the world. Bookescaperooms will allow their players to easily and quickly book their escape room based on the number of players. Users of Bookescaperooms will be all amazed and satisfied with the excellent features and benefits that the new website portal has to offer.
###
